EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Quiz Taker that they did not pass the quiz
EmailTemplate.name: Quiz Failure Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Quiz Module Results
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
It looks like you didn’t pass this module with a score of 75% or higher. Please take some time to review the materials and take the learning check again by clicking on the link in the email to retake the module. Reach out with your questions to trainers@homewise.org < mailto:trainers@homewise.org > or call us at 505-983-9473.
Thank you, you’re almost there!
Homewise Team
